data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Antenna
data.value:
Functionality: Antenna Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The engine section of a standard TIE Fighter, containing the vessel's broadcast array.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Battery
data.value:
Functionality: Battery Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The I-a3b Solar Ionization Reactors of TIE Fighters manage and store the energy output generated by the solar arrays.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Gyro
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The Gyro-Servo Unit built into TIE Fighters enable their trademark maneuvrability.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_RepulsorBack
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The repulsorlift engine is an anti-gravity technology created from subnuclear "knots" of space-time made by enormous unmanned power refineries encompassing black holes. Repulsorlift engines have great power but can only accelerate up to a speed of 25m/s. They work better in gravity than in space.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_RepulsorSide
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The repulsorlift engine is an anti-gravity technology created from subnuclear "knots" of space-time made by enormous unmanned power refineries encompassing black holes. Repulsorlift engines have great power but can only accelerate up to a speed of 25m/s. They work better in gravity than in space.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_RepulsorVertical
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The repulsorlift engine is an anti-gravity technology created from subnuclear "knots" of space-time made by enormous unmanned power refineries encompassing black holes. Repulsorlift engines have great power but can only accelerate up to a speed of 25m/s. They work better in gravity than in space.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Thruster
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
This twin ion engine contains no moving nor high-temperature parts, which makes it low-maintenance. Even so it still outperforms most comparable systems and enables the TIE Fighter's remarkable acceleration.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Viewport
data.value:
Functionality: Remote Control Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
This transparisteel viewport protects TIE pilots from the dangers of space. It also contains the circuitry needed to provide the starfighter with rudimentary remote control functionality.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Wing
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The solar-collector wings of TIE Fighters serve as their main source of power and enable longer-term deployments. Warning: The energies collected by thes arrays explode violently when the arrays are destroyed and even cause damage to adjacent blocks.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Hatch
data.value:
Functionality: Connector Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The top hatch of TIE Fighters contains additional transparisteel windows to improve the pilot's situational awareness. They also serve as connection points for the resupply of energy.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Port
data.value:
Functionality: Connector Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The bottom refueling port of TIE Fighters provides an alternative means to supply the starfighter with energy and oxygen.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Lasers
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The L-s1 Laser Cannons operate on the same principles as blaster weaponry - converting energy-rich gas into a glowing particle beam that can pierce, melt through and even disintegrate targets. These weapons are capable of rapid fire but are prone to overheating.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Lasers_RivalAI
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
This proprietary version of the L-s1 is not locked to imperial systems but non-proprietary versions are available.
The L-s1 Laser Cannons operate on the same principles as blaster weaponry - converting energy-rich gas into a glowing particle beam that can pierce, melt through and even disintegrate targets. These weapons are capable of rapid fire but are prone to overheating.

data.name: Description_GFA_SG_TIEFighter_Cockpit
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
Enveloped with quadranium steel armoring, the TIE Fighter's signature standardized ball cockpit provides some degree of protection from micrometeorid impacts and heavy, direct laserfire.

data.name: Description_GFA_LG_TIEFighter_DockingTube_Door
data.value:
Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The airlock part of a TIE docking tube, employed, among other places on Gozanti-class Cruisers.

data.name: Description_GFA_LG_TIEFighter_DockingTube
data.value:
Functionality: Connector Manufacturer: Sienar Fleet Systems
The lower part of a TIE docking tube, as employed on Gozanti-class cruisers. It can only be attached to the corresponding TIE docking tube airlock block.
